summary: Adds new lore friendly armour mash-ups that are part of the Imperial faction\'s equipment.
descriptionHtml:
Adds new lore friendly equipment and armour that better befits an Imperial auxilary legionnaire.  I will be updating this file with new stuff as I finish them, currently as of version 1.0 there are two pieces, a plumed imperial helmet, and a scutum style shield.

To get them ingame open the console and type \'help auxilary 4\'
Comes in light and heavy versions for both shield and helm

Known issues: Some style of hair clip through the helmet, I don\'t know how to fix this so if you do let me know and I\'ll get right on it.

***For those who do not want the mask part: Simply open up the CrestedHelmF or CrestedHelmM with NifSkope (whichever sex your character is), right click on the NiTriShape named \'Mask\' and select Block->Remove Branch.  Save the file using the same name and play on with your glorious mug showing :P
author: Kara
